column1: The  terms  of the  representation  by  the  decision-maker  must  entitle  the  party  to  whom  it  is
addressed to expect, legitimately, one of two things:

column2:
That  a  hearing  or  other  appropriate  procedure  will  be  afforded  before 
the
decision is  made. (Procedural Legitimate Expectation); or
That a benefit of a substantive  nature will  be  granted  or,  if the person  is  already
in  receipt of the benefit, that it will  be  continued and  not be  substantially varied.
